readingMnemonic: You need to use your ability to tell where <kanji>floor</kanji>s are from the outside of the building to find the <kanji>story</kanji> that lets <reading>kay</reading>aks (かい) in. You're coming from the side of the building surrounded by water, so you need to find the kayak floor to get in.
meaningMnemonic: Look at a <radical>building</radical> and <radical>compare</radical> the <radical>white</radical> parts. Each of those white parts is a <kanji>floor</kanji>. Multi-<kanji>story</kanji> buildings have tons of different floors that you can see from the outside.
